titleStmt.title: The songs of Moses and Deborah paraphras'd with poems on several occasions : never before publish'd : to which is added, a Pindarick on Mr. L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: Cleeve, Charles, b. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles Cleeve. Cf. BM.
Dedication to John Churchill (later Duke of Marlborough) signed: C. Cleeve.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
